headline.print_headline: Very Bad Week: Airline Disasters Come in a Cluster
headline.main: Very Bad Week: Airline Disasters Come in a Cluster

lead_paragraph: Nearly 300 passengers perish when their plane is shot out of the sky. Airlines suspend flights to Israel's largest airport after rocket attacks. Two airliners crash during storms. Aviation has suffered one of its worst weeks in memory, a cluster of disasters spanning three continents.
